  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105798</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Too Much Time On Their Hands - Creating Mock Web Sites About Underage Drinking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zu viel Zeit Auf Ihren Händen - Herstellen Der 
Mock Web-Sites Über Underage Das Trinken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trop d'heure Sur Leurs Mains - Créer de Faux 
Sites de Web Au sujet du Boire d'Underage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demasiada Hora Em Suas Mãos - Criando Locais Mock
Do Web Sobre Beber De Underage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Troppo Tempo Sulle Loro Mani - Creare I Luoghi 
Falsi Di Web Circa Bere Di Underage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάρα πολύς χρόνος σε ετοιμότητα τους - που 
δημιουργούν τους πλαστούς ιστοχώρους για την ανήλικη κατανάλωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demasiada Hora En Sus Manos - Crear Sitios Falsos 
Del Web Sobre Beber De Underage</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will consider what they already know about underage drinking and create mock Web sites and links that explore the topic further.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion betrachten Kursteilnehmer, was 
sie bereits über das trinkende underage kennen und stellen mock 
Web-Sites und -verbindungen her, die das Thema weiter erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants considéreront 
ce qu'ils connaissent déjà l'underage buvant et créent les faux 
sites et les liens de Web qui explorent le sujet plus plus 
loin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes considerarão o que 
sabem já sobre o underage que bebe e críam os locais mock e as 
ligações do Web que exploram o tópico mais mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi considereranno che 
cosa già conoscono circa il underage che beve e creano i luoghi falsi
ed i collegamenti di Web che esplorano il soggetto più ulteriormente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν τι 
ξέρουν ήδη για την ανήλικη κατανάλωση και δημιουργούν τους 
πλαστούς ιστοχώρους και τις συνδέσεις που ερευνούν το θέμα 
περαιτέρω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes considerarán lo
que saben ya sobre el underage que bebe y crean los sitios falsos y 
las conexiones del Web que exploran el asunto más lejos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
